descriptionlist.longdescription:
In App Purchase: $3.99

In App Settings:
路 To enter the settings, either long press on home button in tabbar or Instagram text logo.
路 Download Video from posts, IGTV, Reels, etc. (HD | SD)
路 Save Images from posts, Stories, & profiles
路 Block all promo ads
路 Quick seen/unseen Stories/DM's button
路 Keep unsent messages
路 Copy various text like comments, descriptions, bios, etc.
路 Various confirmation prompts on double tap likes
路 And many more settings...


IPA & TrollStore Version?
  • Instructions from here...


    • 路 OR copy this source and add it to ur source list on Altstore, Esign etc..
    路 https://ikghd.site/repo.json

    Refund Policy:
    路 Refund accepted if you encounter issues such as safe mode or the tweak not working.
    路 Must provide full details about the issue, including photos & crash logs.
    路 Change of mind is not accepted; you can see details with photos & videos before buying.
    路 If refund is accepted, processing will take 3 to 7 days.
    路 Thank you & enjoy!


    Subscription | Key & Devices:
    路 1-year subscription (364 days).
    路 The key is for 1 device and is transferable.
